description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is an anonymous reply to someone comparing Black History Month to white power celebrations: Black people: celebrating overcoming slavery and other historical injustices Nazis: celebrating having white skin, and committing historical injustices Idiots on the internet: “these are the same thing” In second place, it’s […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
